author: John
content:
I am quite dumbfounded by the actions of the Malaysian governing bodies. Sometimes I think Malaysia will never prosper with mentality that is still in the 3rd world. What you did Keith is remarkable, I checked a few of my family members IC and well, you don't need to know the rest of the story. I can't believe a large data breach occurred back in 2014, and thanks to some irresponsible individual, we are only knowing it now. 

Shame on the telcos.

Shame on the governing bodies.

Shame on the country
